insert into Mark ( mark_id, path_id, mark_title, mark_addr1, mark_addr2, mark_contentId, mark_contentTypeId, mark_contentType, mark_firstImageURI, mark_firstImageURI2, mark_posX, mark_posY, mark_tel, mark_placeOrder, mark_area )
select ${item.markId}, ${item.pathId}, #{item.title}, #{item.addr1}, #{item.addr2}, ${item.contentId}, #{item.contentTypeId}, #{item.contentType}, #{item.firstImageURI}, #{item.firstImageURI2}, ${item.posX}, ${item.posY}, #{item.tel}, ${item.placeOrder}, #{item.area} from dual
mapper.select:
SELECT p.PATH_ID, m.USER_NAME, p.CREATE_DATE, p.UPDATE_DATE, p.PATH_TITLE, p.PATH_VIEWS, (SELECT count(*) FROM FAVORITE f WHERE PATH_ID = p.path_id) recommend, p.PATH_starting_Area, p.PATH_destination_Area FROM PATH p JOIN MEMBERUSER m ON p.USER_ID = m.USER_ID
JOIN (SELECT PATH_ID FROM FAVORITE f WHERE USER_ID = (SELECT USER_ID FROM MEMBERUSER m WHERE USER_NAME = #{username})) f ON p.path_id = f.PATH_ID
where 1 = 1
and p.PATH_TITLE like '%${searchWord}%'
and m.USER_NAME like '%${searchWord}%'
Order by p.create_date desc
Order by p.PATH_VIEWS desc
Order by recommend desc

SELECT MARK_TITLE, MARK_ADDR1, MARK_ADDR2, MARK_CONTENTID, MARK_CONTENTTYPEID, MARK_CONTENTTYPE, MARK_FIRSTIMAGEURI, MARK_FIRSTIMAGEURI2, MARK_POSX, MARK_POSY, MARK_TEL, MARK_PLACEORDER, MARK_AREA FROM MARK WHERE MARK.PATH_ID = ${pathId} ORDER BY MARK.MARK_PLACEORDER
